title: three_level_classification_architecture
description: Airbnb New User Bookings CompetitionAuthor: Sandro Vega Pons (sv.pons@gmail.com) The main 3 points of this notebook are:  Source code of the ensemble techniques I used in my solution. Example of how to use them in a 3-layer learning architecture. Analysis of the performance of the methods on problems with different number of classes.  Comparison with stack generalization based on LogisticRegression (sklearn implementation) and GradientBoosting (XGBoost implementation).
